biotools.summary: Integrated Meta-omic Pipeline. Large-scale standardized integrated analysis of coupled metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data. Incorporates robust read preprocessing, iterative co-assembly of metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data, analyses of microbial community structure and function as well as genomic signature-based visualizations.
